definitions.definition: A statement , especially one given under oath ; testimony
A written recommendation of someone's worth or character
A tribute given in appreciation of someone's service etc.
A match played in tribute to a particular player (who sometimes receives a proportion of the gate money).

main_definition: A statement , especially one given under oath ; testimony
secondary_definitions: A written recommendation of someone's worth or character
A tribute given in appreciation of someone's service etc.
( soccer ) A match played in tribute to a particular player (who sometimes receives a proportion of the gate money).
